title: VT Human-Powered Submarine Website
summary: Redesigned the VT HPS team's static site into a modern full-stack web app with better interactivity and CMS-like editing.

description.situation: The HPS program needed a modern site to inform, engage, and direct students and faculty.
description.task: Design and deploy a clean, professional website for the VT HPS department with easy content updates.
description.action: I built the frontend using React and designed a modular layout with reusable components for speed and clarity.
description.result: The site was well-received by staff and is now a central point of communication for the program.

challenges: Migrating from hard-coded HTML to a modular full-stack framework.
Designing an intuitive user interface for new student recruitment.
Enabling non-technical team members to update the site easily.
contributions: Built the gallery, form submission, and image filtering components.
Designed all MongoDB schemas and backend endpoints.
Guided other team members in debugging and styling.
